website_summaries.verdict: Three for the price of one – two poufs and an end table in on-trend neutral tones.
pros: Made of all-weather polypropylene resin that looks like cable knit, these are multi-functional items
Table doubles as a 10 gallon-sized storage bin or can flip over for extra seating
Poufs are just the right height to use as footstools
Sturdy so they don’t blow around
Plastic is easy to wipe clean
Set nests together when not in use to save space
cons: Reports of the lid of the table being too loose to close properly

website_summaries.verdict: Whether you need a table, additional seating, or a footrest, this stylish three-piece set does it all, and offers convenient storage to boot.
pros: Includes two large concave poufs which can be used as footrests or seats and an end table that doubles as a storage solution
Appealing modern design complements a variety of decor styles
cons: The table lid is a bit loose
Can crack if the weight limit is exceeded

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but not that good. Lasted a week
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. But very weak. Broke in half the first week
customer_reviews.author: hadi

customer_reviews.title: It's Just Your Basic Plastic
customer_reviews.text: I did not do my due diligence before clicking that BUY NOW button. I had read some very positive reviews and found the color scheme to be attractive (taupe and light blue option). I did not look well enough to notice there were not free returns and the return fee is $ 27. Had I seen this in person, I would not have given it a second glance. It's nothing more than plastic. Even though I am losing $ 27, it's my best option as would be displeased every time I glanced at it had I kept it. Returned immediately upon delivery. My advice is to pass it up.
customer_reviews.author: PVB Fl

customer_reviews.title: 😍😍😍😍
customer_reviews.text: Amazon won't let me leave a bunch of heart eye emojis but please understand that if they did, I absolutely would. These are the perfect finishing touch to our back patio.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J. Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of them, but had them shipped twice to arrive broken both times.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Humes

customer_reviews.title: Love love love.
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are comfortable to sit on! And what I love most... they're multi purpose! Sit, put your feet up, or use as a table.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Weckbacher

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Although the item came with no extra packaged cushions (see video), it did not break! Seems to be a durable material and easy to clean (power wash). It has held up in the rain so far (I've had it during a heavy rain week). I liked it so much, I purchased it in the other color (white ottomans and grey(ish) table).
customer_reviews.author: HOMEING

customer_reviews.title: Also the quality of it isn't the best. It could brake easily
customer_reviews.text: The box came damaged, there for the item was silty damaged as well. The Gray seats had these random wholes in them in 4 areas, that you can't see in the add. There wasn't any padding in the box to protect it from possible shipping damages. Also the quality of it isn't the best. It could brake easily. But it looks really nice, returning it today.
customer_reviews.author: Zay

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional plastic wicker that serves perfectly as spare extra furniture indoors and out!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely pleased with this set! Currently we are furnishing our living room (contemporary style) that will include leather and these poufs. We have family visiting for Christmas and can easily move the poufs throughout the house and outdoors. We also plan to use them as foot rests. The little table is adorable, and I love how all 3 pieces stack together to condense when not needed.
customer_reviews.author: ADC

customer_reviews.title: Great!.....if you want a cheap plastic ottoman.
customer_reviews.text: I am laughing at this product right now. It looked like a children's toy bin, definitely not suitable for indoor use. I was very surprised. It looks like the picture, but the pictures look like "knit" "poufs" both words which indicate a textile knit fabric and not cheap looking plastic. Plastic furniture is a NEVER. A real knit pouf with this look would be so chic and contemporary, but this is just cheap and condemnatory. $99, for a plastic toy bin...um no thank you.
customer_reviews.author: London Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this set! It’s so great for outdoors and really added an instant appeal to our back porch. I was very hesitant to buy this at first because of the mixed reviews but I decided to take a risk because of how much I like it and so glad I did. Seems sturdy enough for me and nice colors, too. Love how versatile it can be. It’s nice on the lawn as added informal sitting especially for kids during parties and works great, too, as foot stool of sorts and great for serving trays as well. The storage is an added bonus. Hoping that it will last long outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: May@36

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this when we first got it
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this when we first got it. I was sitting on a cushion tonight and the plastic just broke. The weight limit said 180 or 200 pounds. I am 164. I have had the product less than a year. It gets used maybe once a week and it broke. I am very disappointed. I am out of warrenty period so I cannot get a replacement it my money back. Don’t purchase this cheap product.
customer_reviews.author: Holden

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, color misleading
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. It is perfect for our back deck. We use the ottomans as seats and as footrests for our wicker loveseat. We’ve had them for probably about two months now and they are still in great shape. There are a couple of things to be aware of - as others have said, the side table’s lid does not fit perfectly on the table so rainwater does leak in a bit..not good for storing anything that isn’t waterproof. Also, I would definitely not call the color Harvest Brown...it’s gray. Still works with our patio because everything is neutral. Overall, they look so cute and I’m happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa G.

customer_reviews.title: Fairly happy with these.
customer_reviews.text: I am fairly happy with this set. It is a good value for the price, two things bother me. First, the footstools has three marks on the top that really stand out when you look at them. I believe they are manufacturing remnants from where the resin was broken from a mold or other production appliance. Thus, they are not really defects, but are present on every footstool. Second, the lid on the table really sucks. It fits very loosely and the slightest bump jars it our of level. If the manufacturer puts a little more thought into this product, then it could be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: TexasNeighbor

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much. One of the best purchases I have gotten from Amazon. No weird discolored elements poking out for me, so perhaps they improved manufacturing process. Either way, they feel great to sit on, table is super cute, colors are muted and fit perfectly with our living room. Our son moved them around to suit him. Love how light and yet solid they feel. I am actually pondering getting two or three more sets for summer sitting outside for the kids. This set is the snack area for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Buttons

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest little nook set for a small area, smaller statured adults and children. I'm 5'5" and i love it. The table has storage (can't pass on a little storage). I purchased this set for my patio for my quaint hookah smoking space. (ITS GOING TO BE PERFECT!!!) The table and seats are very sturdy (don't sit on the table because the cover is over a hollow space) The set is made out of a hard plastic, may have been made with an industrial sized 3D scanner. It's currently the fall here in Texas, not sure how they will hold up in Texas heat, but I'll let you know next week ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Ms Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, looks good
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned ordering this because there were several reviews that said the they had received broken items. I got the brown set and they came in one box nested together. The box was a little beat up but the products was intact. These are extremely light weight and easy to move around. They don't look too "plasticy" in my opinion, at least the color that I got doesn't. They are a little shorter than I'd like but that is my fault for not paying attention to measurements. I do feel like they should be a little cheaper though since they are truly light weight plastic.
customer_reviews.author: cahunt

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute. Yes, they are a very sturdy PLASTIC. Great for the dirty outside. I’m using them as a foot stool, but will also be used to sit around the fire pit . They Hose off easily and look brand new. Table is cute also, I used in a different area for my kids storage. Very light to move around, but not light enough to blow away. I would recommend. You don’t have to worry about wet material that ends up smelling bad in the future and constantly needs to be replaced. This is a plastic, but a nice one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy the Brown...
customer_reviews.text: Really great concept, and product looked great in the pictures, plus the items themselves are sturdy and solid, and will definitely hold up to sun and weather. BUT there were defects in the resin pattern and texture in the set I bought (see pictures). Especially noticeable in the brown set I purchased. I called the manufacturer and was told these defects were inherent to their manufacturing process. Replacing them wouldn't fix the problem. So I am returning them. PS Could be that these same defects may be less noticeable on the lighter colored items - but on the brown it was very noticeable
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Soooooo cute!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this set. I searched high and low for anything comparable, but nothing came close. When I finally decided to buy this, it was out of stock. I kicked myself for not buying it sooner. I ended up stalking this until it was available on Amazon again, and as soon as it was, I purchased it and never looked back. All pieces came in great shape and look great on my patio. I have even brought them into the house on occasion, and they don't look terrible in my living room either. They're super sturdy. I saw one minor imperfection on one of the ottomans, but nothing to fret over. So very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tawnie

customer_reviews.title: not a "POUF" - hard plastic
customer_reviews.text: It's a good buy for quick outdoor furniture, but I plan on replacing as soon as I can afford to. First, the seats are pretty low to the ground, which can be a little uncomfortable. They'd be fine for kids. Second, and the bigger issue, is that the seats are definitely not "poufs." They're made of a hard plastic. I guess this is good because it makes them more weather resistant and easier to clean than a soft fabric, but it also makes them less appealing and less comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Avery Jessup

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't what I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Maybe we didn't read the specifics, but we assumed that this would be some type of knitted material and not fully plastic. But using this outside it makes sense to use a weatherproof material. So it looks nice and completes our outdoor space, but it wasn't what we thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra and Brian

customer_reviews.title: In perfect condition!
customer_reviews.text: Received my set with no defects on any of the pieces! Exactly what I was looking for and the colors match the advertised picture. The poufs seem sturdy..they held me and my boyfriend. I'll update if they don't last. But in the meantime I can't wait to utilize this set and finish setting up my patio!
customer_reviews.author: Ana Nazario

customer_reviews.title: Universal Use (sit on it, use it as a stool, use it for your feet, put your laptop on it, patio)
customer_reviews.text: OK so this actually wasn't what I was expecting. I thought the pouf was actually going to be a traditional pouf actually knit and soft. However it's actually made of plastic like material. And that's not a bad thing but I have actually come to LOVE this set. Why? Bc of it's universal use. I have one pouf on my patio. Kept one poof indoor. And used the storage table as a casual side table for my sofa. I use the poufs to sit on and I also use them as a footrest. And they are comfortable. Strong and sturdy. This was even more than I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Moose

customer_reviews.title: They add character to the yard!
customer_reviews.text: Cute, attractive and versatile. You can use them as foot stools, hold your drinks or apps, you can put potted flowers on them like I did with the blue one, and by the photo the site uses, possibly even sit on them, but I haven’t tried that out yet. I’m not sure if they’re worth $100. I didn’t shop around so I wouldn’t be surprised if I could find something similar elsewhere for $75, maybe less, but I like them a lot so I can’t complain too much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable service !
customer_reviews.text: When I first order this item on a Friday i received them Sunday morning but the UPS delivered them with a puncture on the side of the box which ended up damaging one of the bigger ones so I sent them back that very same day and received a new set 2 days after, quick service! Only have had them for two days and I already love them. They’re very sturdy and the colors are beautiful ! Thought they might be a little on the small size but they are not. Absolutely love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn F.

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: I put these on a lanai on rainforest in Hawaii. Perfect for wet weather. Subtle colors. Nice texture. Multifunctional pieces. Look like knitted "poufs" but are more durable plastic. A little low next to some of our furniture. Be sure you measure the furniture that will be around these before you order. Sophisticated and useful.
customer_reviews.author: Tag

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Hello, So overall I really love the look and the sturdy needs. However some customers have recieved their product broken which I COULD defo see happening the way the package this product in a box is AWFUL! Not Amazon’s fault? NOT sure. Mine came with BLEMISHES punctures from the way the are placed in the box. They are very small you would have to really inspect the item to see where they are but it is VERY clear it is from how Keter packages. Whoever the vendor/seller of this item really should contact KETER because this really could have been prevented. Other then that fun product.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Love them for indoor use!
customer_reviews.text: Got these to use as living room coffee table set in my modern themed space. I painted the seats grey to match my cookies because they were more than then the picture showed. Very study, handy, and when I entertain the can be used as extra seating or foot rests. Love the little table that is easily moveable as needed for use. So happy with my purchase! Sturdy and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Glori

customer_reviews.title: Look great on the patio! Durable, fun
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Wonderful addition to my small patio space. I didn’t read the description very well so I wasn’t aware that they were plastic, but they still look nice and are heavy duty and durable. I use the poofs as Ottomans and seats. I’m so pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Daphne25

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile but also not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these guys for a new house and they look very nice. The colors worked really well with our house and you could move them around super easily since they only weight like 5 pounds. The blue container thing was really perfect for storing blankets inside. The one thing about these guys that brings down my review is their sturdiness. They first of all feel very flimsy and you can't even sit on the blue storage one even though it looks exactly like something you should sit on. When I sit on them now I can feel them warp a little and I am scared they might break soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jinlian Yang

customer_reviews.title: Multifunctional & Weather resistant
customer_reviews.text: I like that you can use these for multiple purposes- ottoman, chair, table. The only thing I don't like is how the table top is not secure. These do well in the rain and dry quickly. The slightest wind blows it off. So I had to just turn it upside down and use the bottom of the table as the top. I paid $100. I think they are overpriced for more than that. They are simple plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Dharma

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome! We use these to put our feet up ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! We use these to put our feet up or to sit on when we have more people over. They are sturdy and don't blow away when we get a storm. Love how they ad some style and texture to the rest of our furniture. The tall one is perfect for setting your drink on. These were an inexspensive way to ad some more furniture to our deck. Came in two days!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Byram

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and how easy these are to move around. I use the two tan “poufs” interchangeably as footrests, low stools, and side tables for our patio. When it’s hard on my knees to keep crouching to play with my daughter, I love to grab one of these to sit in. They are also flat so you can use them for plates/drinks outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: M Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: Not very impressed with this set.
customer_reviews.text: Kind of an awkward product that doesn't work well for any one purpose. It works OK as storage, but is kinda bulky and cumbersome if you try and keep the table nested within the ottomans. The ottomans are made of a firm plastic which hurts the heels of your feet after a few minutes (you kinda need a cushion between the ottoman and your feet to be comfy). Not an ideal form of extra seating. Slides too easily on hard floors, and not easily enough on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: VoteForPablo

customer_reviews.title: Pull up a seat
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned lid doesn't fit the ''table'' like it's supposed to. we put the lid on upside down and worked the top portion around it and it stays. Not convenient for storage useage though. We actually turned the whole thing upside down and friends use it as a seat. Works great for pull up extra seating by our firepit. Arrived quickly. I had no problem with condition or damage w/packaging as others had noted. Price maybe a little high, but you do get 3 pcs.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Light
customer_reviews.text: These poufs are one of my best buys ever. I use one for blankets which can easily be turned over for seating or for use as an Ottoman. The small blue table also has a top that comes off so it can be used for storage as well. These are so lightweight but extremely strong. I highly recommend these for indoor and outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Principe

customer_reviews.title: Completes the patio! Great value!
customer_reviews.text: colors look great, the plastic-like material is very strong. We have stool on them and husband is 160s. Great value in comparison with other options and outlasts the elements with sturdiness. Took one star off since the storage table weaves do have holes for the knit look so you can't store things and keep them completely dry if it rains. Minimal moisture though. Don't mind the picture of our newly-brushed dog.
customer_reviews.author: R.L.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It looks much better in the picture. I’m still glad I bought it because it wasn’t very expensive. The material is very plasticky and you really can’t store anything in it that you wants to protect from rain. You can see it about six pretty obvious areas where they cut the plastic from the extrusion machine. On the plus side, they are very lightweight and with the addition of pillows they could be used for outdoor Ottomans. I think these pieces are good as transitional if you’re not ready to invest a lot of money in outdoor Furniture
customer_reviews.author: Aaaaaaaa

customer_reviews.title: Super functional and attractive ottomans
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a foot rest for adirondeck style chairs on my deck, when I came across this set. I was a little concerned about the basket weave and how sturdy it would be or if they would be difficult to clean. However, I was super pleased with the quality when I pulled them out of the box. Now that I've had time to use the ottomans, I'm still thrilled with this purchase. I would have paid the price for just the two ottoman, so the little storage table is a great bonus!
customer_reviews.author: justmelTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are so great! Sturdy plastic material and we loved the grey so much with kids and a dog, we kept the two grey ones inside haha! The white is great. Love that it is also storage and a nice top for holding drinks and snacks. Highly recommend. They seem like they’ll last a long time and will be easy to hose down if needed.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Nice set durable looks great
customer_reviews.text: Everyone fights over the ottomans as they are great with chairs or as with seating. Well made, stays clean looks great. Table also has hidden area to store items like garden tools.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. Mine came in perfect condition. Can’t wait to put them on my porch!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Henneberg

customer_reviews.title: Modern cozy feel
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten so many compliments on these. They are plastic not fabric but I don’t mind. The table lid pops off so I can store objects inside and don’t be surprised that the ottoman poufs have no bottom, they just set in the ground. For the price though you cannot best this and honestly they look better than anything else I’ve ever seen!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna J. Alva

customer_reviews.title: Instant cool factor
customer_reviews.text: These are SO neat. They come in a modest size box since they all stack into each other. The height of the table was fine for my club chairs. I think the ottomans are especially great for kids to sit on, or your feet. I would not recommend someone over 200 lbs sitting fully on them although I could be wrong. Heavy enough they have never blown around. Buy these!
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Extremely versatile
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t sure if I wanted to use these for my screened in front porch or for inside my house but they seemed to look nice enough inside. Quality is really good. I’m 150lbs and the large stool ever so slightly dips in a little when I sit down but not enough to where I think I’m going to break it. Love how versatile these pieces are.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: These items are so versatile and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Wow these are fantastic. The grey ones are reinforced with a thick plastic liner and hold adults well. The one with the plastic table top is perfect to store items in and well done. I purchased small circular cushions to use when people sit on the puffs or I use it as an outdoor ottoman. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Kitaoka

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, beautiful, and convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when I saw how sturdy the set is and how versatile it can be. I am extremely satisfied with my purchase! I can use it indoors and outdoors so love that flexibility because it adds extra seating anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Highlight of my patio!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! Such a great set for the price! I ordered this set to use as ottomans and they are the perfect size. The storage table is a great fit for storing my kids goggles and diving toys! 100% Recomend!
customer_reviews.author: WEB124

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful piece, horrible service
customer_reviews.text: Love the set as a whole. The customer service for when a piece doesn't come with it, is horrible. All I wanted to do is get the table that wasn't sent. But in order to do that I had to return the poufs, etc etc. Well I go back to order the exact same color combo and it is almost doubled in price. Very disappointing. If you get the entire set it is a wonderful addition to our backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Just to be clear these poufs are resin! It was a nice mistake. I didn't read the description and thought I was getting the knitted ones but these will come in handy this summer when we have outdoor get togethers. They can also be used in the house for extra seating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.text: Affordable, stackable and attractive. I purchased this set while looking for “poufs” to use as low footstools with my patio chairs. Overall, I’m very pleased with size, color and visual appeal. An added bonus is the table can be used to store small items.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Yates

customer_reviews.title: Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the funnest accent furniture I have ever bought. I use them for extra seating in my little living room, my four year old hides in them, flips them over for you storage and to climb inside for a snack 😂 Best purchase EVER!! I have found them to be very durable considering the amount of moving around climbing on/in they get from my little one
customer_reviews.author: Zen'd In

customer_reviews.title: Great for a casual outdoor set - they’re not bean bags though!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for what we needed! Just wanted something on the balcony for friends who smoke until we could get a nice set. Also the size was very convenient. Didn’t realize they were plastic though until they arrived, and even the seats were hollow. Sturdy and I’m not worried when sitting on them, but I expected a bean bag type of thing since they were called “knit pouf set” - still works for what we wanted them for though! Just not as comfy ;)
customer_reviews.author: Lexlynn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: First, let me say—I wanted to LOVE this!! Because it’s such a practical & nice looking set! However, it arrived cracked/split. I am hoping the manufacturer will do something about this. (will update) Other than that, the set looks and is true to color of the images.
customer_reviews.author: YA

customer_reviews.title: An inviting little set.
customer_reviews.text: The overall size and low profile of this set is perfect for my small space and it looks adorable. It is surprisingly sturdy and comfortable considering the height of the stools and the non-cushioned plastic seat. It is lightweight and stacks to store. I like that I can just pick it up and move it with ease. I have not needed to clean it but it looks like it will be easy to care for through the seasons. I think the price-point at the time of my purchase fair and I am pleased that it is exactly as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Good to have
customer_reviews.text: Good for outdoor use, they are big enough to comfortably sit on. The table that comes with the set is great because you can take the top off and store things in the table. The set is extremely light so the only problem I have had is the set blowing around with high wind.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Customer service dropped the bell. Did nothing to help
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but does not last. They already cracking. Really love the concept, but both seats are either defective( breaking down) or just bad. Table is great:(.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: doubles as storage
customer_reviews.text: Amazon continues to demonstrate why it has overthrown and dominated all of retail. Last minute shopping for a garden party These were on my doorstep the next day out of the box ready and being used sturdy perfect for outdoors the tall one doubles as storage. I don’t think outdoor “pouf” is a good description these are hard plastic not softer fabric or wicker
customer_reviews.author: Sean G

customer_reviews.title: Interesting set, not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This Knit pouf set is very nice, and maybe its just me but the entire exterior is hard and feels like plastic. I thought this would be soft and could be used as a floor pillow but no. Its more like a small table with fake plastic yarn on the outside. The pieces are large and look nice but um, what would you do with it? The 3 are exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Way better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Way better than expected. I used them indoors with my Z gallery curve coming couch! LOVE LOVE LOVE THESE!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Tee

customer_reviews.title: Happy all around.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure I’d love them from the pictures but they’re working out really well. The ottomans are bigger than expected and are perfect as stools or as foot rests with the plastic Lowe’s Adirondack chairs I have. The stable has a decent amount of storage, too.
customer_reviews.author: jrs

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected!
customer_reviews.text: Granted we have only had these for 2 days but out of the box we were extremely pleased with how durable and true to the pics we saw on our initial purchase. They are comfortable, durable and DO LOOK like fabric. They were for our daughter as we thought they would be too low for adults but that really isn't the case. The table with storage is perfect for candles and supplies. Very very pleased, a winner all the way!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Adoptante

customer_reviews.title: And they're sturdy. I use them every time my husband BBQs ...
customer_reviews.text: So my patio area is way to small to use both seats. I actually turned one upside down and put it in the garden as a huge planter. Gives my garden a little interest. And they're sturdy. I use them every time my husband BBQs He BBQs while I sit and watch, with a glass of wine.
customer_reviews.author: samantha michelle

customer_reviews.title: Cute and arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.text: Thee are exactly what we needed/wanted and super cute. Ours arrived in perfect condition. Given the other reviews, I wouldn’t bother trying to sit on them. They seem sturdy enough, but why chance it? We have enough chairs anyway. We were just looking for some attractive, simple tables. Done.
customer_reviews.author: BR

customer_reviews.title: Really good except for the table lid
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of these, I am giving them 3 stars because the table lid does not fit on the table, no matter which way I turn it, it just will not sit flat and sturdy. As such it does fall into the storage bin sometime. I like the look and color and the stools are great. I would have purchased more if it was not for the table top quality.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda G

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Like these much more than anticipated. Bought for my new yoga/art studio, (former playroom). One ottoman goes to my hanging chair, the other one, upside down, holds my exercise ball beautifully! The other endtable one keeps getting moved around and will find its forever home soon. I intend to buy matching planters and ice chest soon. Oh, there are some random mold marks, but they don't bother me for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Collins

customer_reviews.title: Decor only
customer_reviews.text: Its not the best material , get it if its on sale and use as decor only . Works better as a foot rest. Sitting is ideal for a child and not an adult (under 150lb) . One of our seats cracked in weeks. I contacted the company but have not heard back. Oh well...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flexible usage
customer_reviews.text: Not the most comfy things in the world as they are hard molded plastic, but are very versatile for the patio and garden. We use them for the kids sitting around the fire pit, ottomans, side tables and anywhere someone needs to sit in a pinch. Plus they have a little bit of character as they are unusual.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Bought them a second time we liked them so much!
customer_reviews.text: We like our first set so much that we bought a second set. These are portable, sturdy, and weatherproof. The only negative is that the do arrive with some little nicks and dings and blemishes. But hey.... they are outdoor ottomans that can be hosed down! I can live with the little dings for the value!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Oakland

customer_reviews.title: Nicks on the chairs from the mold, but super cute and strong
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute. I’m happy with how sturdy they are and how much weight it can hold. The reason why I’m rating 4 stars and not 5 is because both chairs have nicks in them from the mold (probably) and it’s unfortunate because it’s in an obvious spot too. But usability and aesthetically pleasing from afar.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: They're great!
customer_reviews.text: They are HARD, there is NO GIVE with these, but I use them as a side table and foot rests so that's fine. I wrapped the one I use indoors with a thin patterned tapestry because they start to hurt when leave your bare feet on them.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like how these looked. I was surprised to see the 2 rounder ones to be the same size/height. In the pics, they look different sizes to me but it is the angle the pics were taken. I don’t know if I’d pay $99 for another set. Definitely makes my patio looks nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Zulay Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: My fault for not realizing they were plastic but they are nice especially if you are using outdoors. Mine are indoors and I've placed Natural textured items on top and it's working great. There is also plenty of room to place a storage bin under the shorter round ones. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: These are PLASTIC !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t be fooled by the pretty colors as I was....If you think your getting a quality product, you need to know these are PLASTIC!!!! Only a child could sit on this. Besides that, who wants these plastic pieces in their room? Maybe a nursery ? Will return this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gagirl

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely perfect! I am placing them poolside. They will be very useful to put my feet up and the table to store a blanket for chilly evenings and place a drink. Arrived in perfect condition. I was hesitant about purchasing because of other reviews. Not one issue with mine. Common sense would be not to sit on them.
customer_reviews.author: Meggie

customer_reviews.title: Modern and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Amazing ottomans so comfortable to rest your feet on, plus they look so fantastically modern/fun and can provide extra seating if need. The table is nice too and good for storage of blankets/pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: Really versatile, cool set for my new deck! I would recommend watching the video that shows storage options and the table opens up for storage too! Just love the additional seating and I can leave it out all summer!
customer_reviews.author: Anita M. Hurless

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: Went through a lot to get the product, from UPS saying they delivered the package (which never arrived) to finally getting it a week late and it’s broken. Im a bit disappointed that it came with a hole in one of the seats. Dont feel like going through that hassle to order a replacement. Material is different than i thought, feel like a heavy plastic but still looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kai C Hsieh

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I bought these just to use as foot stools around my pool area. Didn’t really expect too much but omg they are so nice that I’m thinking of buying a few more sets to use for seating for parties & stuff. Super lightweight, sturdy & I love the colors!! Not sure how they’ll hold up but we’ll see! Such a great buy! You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: N. Pardo

customer_reviews.title: Looks just as pictured
customer_reviews.text: It looks just as pictured. It’s plastic and not exactly the sturdiest furniture but it works great for what it is. I love it on my patio I think it looks trendy and serves its purpose for much cheaper I found elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Erin Lackey

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Seems a little pricey for what it is but otherwise, we are happy with them. The table is nice and sturdy with a removable top for storage and the ottomans can double as extra seating but they’ve been nice to kick back and put our feet up while enjoying our yard. Adds a nice little touch
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have said, these are molded plastic. The packaging is terrible so we are lucky that ours did not arrive broken. They look amazing in our backyard with the outdoor set but are really not sturdy enough for seats so I’m pretty sure my friends will break them if I don’t put things on them. Overall I would still order them again for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trendy and classy!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough good things about these items. I ordered two sets for my porch, and stacked the two extra in a corner for guests. The colors are perfect. They all arrived in perfect condition. Lightweight, weather resistant, and TOTALLY withstood my neighbor and his 200 pound body sitting on it. They are the perfect combination of trendy and classy. Big Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Eisenhauer

customer_reviews.title: Nice light weight foot stools for outside.
customer_reviews.text: Great for footstools on my screened porch. They are a bit bigger around than I expected but ok. They are very light so the Kansas wind does blow them about if they aren’t up against a wall when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Kanalis Ockree

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed. They look like cheap plastic. Not comfortable at all. Claim up to 250 pounds can sit on them but they don’t feel that strong. Not happy with them at all.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: Soft pouf? Whoever wrote their description failed. miserably. This is HARD plastic. Not one soft thing about it. Very disappointed and would have never purchased this in person. This is the kind of purchase on Amazon I regret. It's my own fault - gonna have to make some rules for purchases on Amazon anymore. My mistakes are costing me too much $$!!
customer_reviews.author: jmeier

customer_reviews.title: Not Knit! Plastic!
customer_reviews.text: This seems like false advertising. To call them "Knit Pouf" implies the texture is soft. And knit. They are very hard plastic meant to look knit. I will be using the seats outside and maybe the table too. Should be advertised as plastic outdoor furniture. Not cozy and soft like the name says. Seems a lot of people made this mistake. Be sure you know what you're ordering!
customer_reviews.author: jsar

customer_reviews.title: Love these, great product
customer_reviews.text: No dislikes, made well and just the perfect height and size. We got these for use on our screened back porch. Already used multiple times. I can already tell they'll be one of our fav Amazon purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not crochet, not soft, but durable.
customer_reviews.text: These are a heavy plastic, just to let you. I think a lot might depend on the color combo. Some combos probably look better than others, and I'm okay with mine (ivory and taupe). I wouldn't pay more than I did for the 3 pieces ($68), but they function great outside.
customer_reviews.author: Jlwleighton

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying this handy set of bedroom accessories! The contemporary colors blend well and I find the lidded bin very handy at bedside, as I can tuck things away when not needed. The knit designed poufs make nice places to sit, and the texture and finish of the three pieces is a practical way for me to complete my decorating.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Jones

customer_reviews.title: it does sit close to the ground but surprisingly comfortable!  broke too soon!
customer_reviews.text: Cute as ever! it does sit close to the ground but surprisingly comfortable! had for a short time and one of the seats have cracked :(
customer_reviews.author: hope

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on my porch
customer_reviews.text: This set showed up much earlier that expected, and they look great on my porch. I'm using them as ottomans, and don't think they would be suitable for sitting on.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set!!!! It’s just so cute, practical, easy to move around, soft enough for small children (round edges so they don’t hit themselves). Goes well with other wicker furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I needed some versatile, portable outdoor furniture and this set is perfect! It is much sturdier than it looks and can easily blend into existing decor. The plastic is easy to lean and the pieces are about as light as a feather. It is also more comfortable to sit on than what I expected! The size also works for kids as well as large adults- giving the set the versatility​ that I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Midwives Rising

customer_reviews.title: exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a couple of foot stools but didn't want to spend a small fortune for them. They work perfectly for that. The table, I have in a spare bedroom storing a blanket. I haven't attempted to sit on them as that's not why I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love these! I bought two sets and have them on our pool deck. We use the table on our tanning ledge and it fills with water and stays put!
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute additionally seating for my deck. Very light weight and not extremely sturdy but I have sat on them with no problem. The side table/storage one is very convenient. I don't know if I would purchase again but I do not regret splurging!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very rugged but gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Love this very simple Scandinavian style. I love how it piles into each other. The problem is that if anyone sits on it who is over 130lbs it would crack. So this is better for small women or children. I am very small so I love it. I sit on the chair on my balcony and study with the small table. It is gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Cute Outdoor
customer_reviews.text: I don’t realize how flimsy these where when ordering. I should have paid more attention they are for patio furniture not designed for indoors and long durability.
customer_reviews.author: Brandee Winter

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some compact patio furniture. I came across these and paired them with a set of chairs, and love how it turned out. Our patio isn't that bis so I didn't want big pieces of furniture. These are just right. The round pieces double as foot rests or stools if more seating I needed. The little table has storage. They are strong and durable and the colors are true to picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Keter Urban Knit Pouf Ottoman Set of 2 with Storage Table for Patio and Room Décor-Perfect for Balcony, Deck, and Outdoor Seating, Dune/Misty Blue
product_meta.description:
Color:Dune/Misty Blue

Unique and convenient, the Cozy Urban set from Keter's KNIT collection comes with two rounded “pouf” style Cozy seats and one multi-functional Cozy end table/ottoman, which doubles as a storage bin. Ideal for everything from conversation patio set to kids’ tea party to a cozy corner of your living room, this set is both compact and functional. You can sit on the soft poufs and enjoy the great outdoors, or bring them inside for a modern look in any space in your home. The end table allows you to have a surface for holding drinks, snacks, and books, basically, anything you need to set on a flat surface, while also giving you extra storage space. The warm neutral tones and sleek rounded form of this set will blend nicely with a wide array of indoor or outdoor décor. What better way to bring additional seating options into your home, apartment, balcony, dorm room or patio.

Compact Size and Versatile Storage

With its versatile design, the Cozy table contains a nice surprise… 10 gallons of additional storage. You’ll appreciate the extra indoor storage for coffee table books, throws, children’s toys, or outdoor patio storage. Keter definitely had small spaces in mind when they made this set. The Cozy Urban set is designed to nest together for painless storage. Have unexpected guests? Just flip over the chairs and remove the table for extra seating with a table. When your guests have gone, wipe it off, stow the table in the chairs and tuck the set away. The finished nested set can fit easily in a closet or shed and even makes an attractive interesting conversation piece in a nook or corner.

Top Features

 * Coordinating storage table and 2 seating poufs
 * Table: 16 W x 16 D x 16.3 H inches
 * Seat: 22.5 W x 22.5 D x 12.4 H inches
 * The table provides 10.83 gallons of storage space.
 * Attractive intricate knit-style braided texture
 * Multi-functional side table gives you additional storage while allowing you to place items on top
 * Lightweight, compact design makes it fit in perfectly just about anywhere
 * Made out of durable, rust-proof, all-weather polypropylene resin for exceptional durability
 * UV protection so it will never fade
 * Suitable for indoor and outdoor use
feature_bullets: RESIN CONSTRUCTION: Made out of durable, rust-proof, all-weather polypropylene resin for exceptional durability
DURABLE AND STRONG: Weather-resistant polypropylene construction prevents rusting, peeling and denting - unlike real Knit
SEATING CAPACITY: Tough polypropylene resin construction seating poufs hold up to 242 pounds each
HIDDEN STORAGE: The table provides 10 gallons of storage space. Ideal for everything from patio furniture to kids’ tea parties to the corner of your living room
STACKABLE FOR STORAGE: Nesting design allows for easy storage in a pinch
NO ASSEMBLY: Requires no assembly, ready to enjoy right out of the box
VERSATILE USE: Perfect to use as front porch decor, fire pit seating, outdoor chairs, balcony set, and poolside seating which will complement any patio furniture set
IDEAL SIZES: Table: 16 W x 16 D x 16. 3 H inches / Seat: 22. 3 W x 22. 3 D x 12. 5 H inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,491 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars

categories: Home Gift Guide: Featured Keter Products
